author: ehu
msg: Push propfile handling back into libsvn_wc/props.c.
Note: This change centralizes all prop file access and thereby
allows for 'easy' change of storage method for props.
(svn_wc__prop_path): ... here. Add a prop_kind parameter to signal
(svn_wc__props_kind_t): New enum to specify prop classes.
svn_wc__save_prop_file): ... these, since they have become
(and should stay) implementation details of the props module.
New functions to delete specified props.
(svn_wc__props_last_modified): New. Function to check for last
(svn_wc__load_props): Add revert_props_p parameter to be able to load
(mark_tree): Clear wcprops while walking the tree. This way,
we don't need to walk the tree again afterwards. (Allows removal of
(revert_admin_things): Use revert_base only if entry->copied is true.
[Note: This was probably just compensating for other bugs, as the
confusion of copyfrom-history with schedule-replace had been rampant;
Anyway, this part of the change was reverted / rewritten in r33063.]

author: pburba
msg: Add merge test for issue #2893, handle merge info for portions of a tree not
checked out due to insufficient authz.
(test_list): Set mergeinfo_and_skipped_paths as XFail until issue #2893

author: pburba
msg: (merge_to_sparse_directories): Remove comment about being XFail until

author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r26471, make variable declarations C89 compatible.
(add_file): Move variable declaration before any statements.
